humans.map:
(doc)->
  {P31} = doc.claims
  if P31?
    P31.forEach (val)->
      id = val?.mainsnak?.datavalue?.value?['numeric-id']
      if id is 5
        emit doc._id, null

byBirthday.map:
(doc)->
  {P569} = doc.claims
  if P569?
    val = P569[0]
    { time, precision } = val?.mainsnak?.datavalue?.value
    if precision? and precision > 10
      date = time.split('T')[0].slice(1)
      [ year, month, day ] = date.split('-')
      emit [day, month], null
